name: The Book of Sorrows
description:

In this absorbing, highly original fantasy, Chauntecleer, Pertelote, and the other familiar characters of the Coop struggle to piece together their shattered lives in the aftermath of the terrible conflict with the dreaded Wyrm. But their respite is short-lived: into this struggling community, Wyrm once again insinuates himself, with dire consequences for all.

This moving story has finally been adapted into a exciting role-playing video game designed for the pc. Containing six different levels and intricately designed cutscenes, The Book of Sorrows is sure to immerse you in Walter Wangerin's world as you upgrade Chauntecleer, unlock new moves, search for Mundo Cani and ultimately battle Wyrm. Play it today!

CONTROLS

X on keyboard or A on controller: jump/swim

C on keyboard or B on controller: attack

D on keyboard or Y on controller: Power #1

S on keyboard or X on controller: Power #2

ESC on keyboard or + on controller: Show/hide Ability Tree
